mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_sys_event (id, userId, userName, description, activeTime, requestPath, methodName, costTime) VALUES (#{id}, #{userId}, #{userName}, #{description}, #{activeTime}, #{requestPath}, #{methodName}, #{costTime})
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_sys_event t
AND t.userName LIKE '%${userName}%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_sys_exceptions (id, className, description, activeTime, methodName) VALUES (#{id}, #{className}, #{description}, #{activeTime}, #{methodName})
mapper.select: SELECT t.* FROM t_sys_exceptions t WHERE t.id = #{id}

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_sys_exceptions t
AND t.className LIKE '%${className}%'
